Module com.andrei.pt_30424_pelle_andrei_assignment_4
Package com.andrei.Controller

Class ClientController

java.lang.Object
com.andrei.Controller.ClientController
public class ClientController extends Object
Controller operations for the client view. Supports searching, filtering and selecting from the table in order to make a new order.

  • Method Details

    • onBack

      protected void onBack(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws IOException
      Back to client login.
      Throws:
      IOException

    • onKeyTyped

      protected void onKeyTyped()
      Perhaps unfortunately named onKeyTyped, this method is called whenever a key is typed in the search bar and whenever ENTER is pressed in the filter fields. The keyword is parsed from the search bar and the filters are parsed from their corresponding filter text fields. We know these parses succeed because each text field only accepts decimal values. Doubles have to be entered with a "," instead of ".", but the user is alerted of that in the GUI. The corresponding filtering method is called in the delivery service and the updated list is returned and set into the table.

    • onCreateOrder

      protected void onCreateOrder()
      Creates an order. Selection from table is acquired and checked for size. If at least 1 product has been selected from the table, the order is generated and an alert is shown containing information about the ordered products.

    • initialize

      public void initialize()
      Sets selection mode to multiple and configures text fields to only accept numbers of type XXX...X,YYY... The table is also loaded with all the menu items initially and the table header is generated similarly to the one in the admin controller.

    • configureTextFieldToAcceptOnlyDecimalValues
